VideoOverlay.playRate

Function/Meaning
Playback rate
Type
VideoOverlay class property (read/write)
Description
Sets the playback rate of the media.
Specifying 1.0 results in normal playback speed, 0.5 is half speed, and 2 is double speed.
The range of possible values depends on the DirectShow filter.
Reference: For MPEG files with audio, values from greater than 0.0 up to 2.0 can be set. For MPEG files without audio, values from greater than 0.0 up to the range of a double (probably) can be set, but the actual playback speed is limited by the processing speed.
